trans-unit.source: <router-link> Props
trans-unit.target: <router-link> 道具

trans-unit.source: <router-link> is preferred over hard-coded <a href="..."> for the following reasons:
trans-unit.target: <router-link> 由于以下原因，与硬编码的 <a href="..."> 相比，首选<router-link>：

trans-unit.source: <router-link> is the component for enabling user navigation in a router-enabled app. The target location is specified with the to prop. It renders as an <a> tag with correct href by default, but can be configured with the tag prop. In addition, the link automatically gets an active CSS class when the target route is active.
trans-unit.target: <router-link> 是用于在启用路由器的应用程序中启用用户导航的组件。目标位置由 to prop 指定。默认情况下，它呈现为具有正确 href 的 <a> 标签，但可以使用 tag prop 进行配置。另外，当目标路由处于活动状态时，链接会自动获得一个活动的CSS类。

trans-unit.target: <router-view> 道具

trans-unit.source: Nav is just a regular component
trans-unit.target: Nav 只是常规组件

trans-unit.source: UserEmailsSubscriptions, UserProfile, UserProfilePreview are nested view components
trans-unit.target: UserEmailsSubscriptions ， UserProfile ， UserProfilePreview 是嵌套视图组件

trans-unit.source: UserSettings is the view component
trans-unit.target: UserSettings 是视图组件

trans-unit.source: abstract: works in all JavaScript environments, e.g. server-side with Node.js. The router will automatically be forced into this mode if no browser API is present.
trans-unit.target: abstract ：可在所有JavaScript环境中使用，例如在服务器端使用Node.js。如果没有浏览器API，路由器将自动被强制进入此模式。

trans-unit.source: append allows you to append the path to the current route (as with router-link)
trans-unit.target: append 允许您将路径追加到 current 路由（与 router-link 一样）

trans-unit.source: current is the current Route by default (most of the time you don't need to change this)
trans-unit.target: current 默认情况下为当前路线（大多数情况下，您无需更改此路线）

trans-unit.source: hash: uses the URL hash for routing. Works in all Vue-supported browsers, including those that do not support HTML5 History API.
trans-unit.target: hash ：使用URL哈希进行路由。在所有Vue支持的浏览器中都可以使用，包括那些不支持HTML5 History API的浏览器。

trans-unit.source: history: requires HTML5 History API and server config. See HTML5 History Mode.
trans-unit.target: history ：需要HTML5 History API和服务器配置。请参阅HTML5历史记录模式。

trans-unit.source: href: resolved url. This would be the href attribute of an a element
trans-unit.target: href ：已解析的网址。这将是 a 元素的 href 属性

trans-unit.source: isActive: true if the active class should be applied. Allows to apply an arbitrary class
trans-unit.target: isActive ：如果应该应用活动类，则为 true 。允许应用任意类

trans-unit.source: isExactActive: true if the exact active class should be applied. Allows to apply an arbitrary class
trans-unit.target: isExactActive ：如果应应用确切的活动类，则为 true 。允许应用任意类

trans-unit.source: navigate: function to trigger the navigation. It will automatically prevent events when necessary, the same way router-link does
trans-unit.target: navigate ：功能触发导航。它将在必要时自动防止事件发生，就像 router-link 一样

trans-unit.source: route: resolved normalized location
trans-unit.target: route ：解析的归一化位置

trans-unit.source: router-link exposes a low level customization through a scoped slot. This is a more advanced API that primarily targets library authors but can come in handy for developers as well, most of the time in a custom component like a NavLink or other.
trans-unit.target: router-link 通过作用域内的slot公开了低级定制。这是一个更高级的API，主要针对库作者，但在大多数情况下，也可以在NavLink等自定义组件中为开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: v-slot API (3.1.0+)
trans-unit.target: v-slot API（3.1.0+）

trans-unit.source: vue-router uses path-to-regexp as its path matching engine, so it supports many advanced matching patterns such as optional dynamic segments, zero or more / one or more requirements, and even custom regex patterns. Check out its documentation for these advanced patterns, and this example of using them in vue-router.
trans-unit.target: vue-router 使用path-to-regexp作为其路径匹配引擎，因此它支持许多高级匹配模式，例如可选动态段，零个或多个/一个或多个需求，甚至是自定义regex模式。查看有关这些高级模式的文档，以及在 vue-router 中使用它们的示例。

trans-unit.source: { selector: string, offset? : { x: number, y: number }} (offset only supported in 2.6.0+)
trans-unit.target: { selector: string, offset? : { x: number, y: number }} （仅2.6.0+支持偏移量）

trans-unit.source: from: Route: the current route being navigated away from.
trans-unit.target: from: Route ：当前的导航路线。

trans-unit.source: next('/') or next({ path: '/' }): redirect to a different location. The current navigation will be aborted and a new one will be started. You can pass any location object to next, which allows you to specify options like replace: true, name: 'home' and any option used in router-link's to prop or router.push
trans-unit.target: next('/') 或 next({ path: '/' }) ：重定向到其他位置。当前导航将被中止，并且将开始新的导航。你可以通过任何位置对象到 next ，它允许您指定类似的选项 replace: true ， name: 'home' 中使用任何选项 router-link 的 to 支撑或 router.push

trans-unit.source: next(): move on to the next hook in the pipeline. If no hooks are left, the navigation is confirmed.
trans-unit.target: next() ：移至管道中的下一个钩子。如果没有钩子，则导航被确认。

trans-unit.source: next(error): (2.4.0+) if the argument passed to next is an instance of Error, the navigation will be aborted and the error will be passed to callbacks registered via router.onError().
trans-unit.target: next(error) ：（2.4.0+）如果传递给 next 的参数是 Error 的实例，则导航将被中止，并且错误将传递给通过 router.onError() 注册的回调。

trans-unit.source: next(false): abort the current navigation. If the browser URL was changed (either manually by the user or via back button), it will be reset to that of the from route.
trans-unit.target: next(false) ：中止当前导航。如果浏览器URL被更改（由用户手动或通过后退按钮更改），它将被重置为 from 路由的URL。

trans-unit.source: next: Function: this function must be called to resolve the hook. The action depends on the arguments provided to next:
trans-unit.target: next: Function ：必须调用此函数才能解决钩子。操作取决于提供给 next 的参数：

trans-unit.source: to: Route: the target Route Object being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: to: Route ：要导航到的目标 Route对象。

trans-unit.source: An alias of /a as /b means when the user visits /b, the URL remains /b, but it will be matched as if the user is visiting /a.
trans-unit.target: /a 的别名为 /b 表示当用户访问 /b 时，URL仍为 /b ，但它将被匹配，就像用户正在访问 /a 一样。

trans-unit.source: Decouple it by using props
trans-unit.target: 使用 props 解耦

trans-unit.source: Fetching After Navigation: perform the navigation first, and fetch data in the incoming component's lifecycle hook. Display a loading state while data is being fetched.
trans-unit.target: 导航后获取：首先执行导航，然后在传入组件的生命周期挂钩中获取数据。在获取数据时显示加载状态。

trans-unit.source: Fetching Before Navigation: Fetch data before navigation in the route enter guard, and perform the navigation after data has been fetched.
trans-unit.target: 导航前获取：在路径中导航前获取数据进入警戒区，并在数据获取后执行导航。

trans-unit.source: Instead of coupling to $route:
trans-unit.target: 而不是耦合到 $route ：

trans-unit.source: Make sure to always call the next function, otherwise the hook will never be resolved.
trans-unit.target: 确保始终调用 next 函数，否则挂钩将永远无法解析。

trans-unit.source: Note that nested paths that start with / will be treated as a root path. This allows you to leverage the component nesting without having to use a nested URL.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，以 / 开头的嵌套路径将被视为根路径。这使您可以利用组件嵌套，而不必使用嵌套的URL。

trans-unit.source: Note: Inside of a Vue instance, you have access to the router instance as $router. You can therefore call this.$router.push.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在Vue实例内部，您可以使用 $router 身份访问路由器实例。因此，您可以调用 this.$router.push 。

trans-unit.source: Note: this feature only works if the browser supports history.pushState.
trans-unit.target: 注意：仅当浏览器支持 history.pushState 时,此功能才有效。

trans-unit.source: Note: If the destination is the same as the current route and only params are changing (e.g. going from one profile to another /users/1 -> /users/2), you will have to use beforeRouteUpdate to react to changes (e.g. fetching the user information).
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果目的地与当前路线相同，并且仅参数在更改（例如，从一个配置文件更改为另一个配置文件 /users/1 - > /users/2 ），则必须使用 beforeRouteUpdate 对更改做出反应（例如，获取用户信息）。

trans-unit.source: All route records matched by a route are exposed on the $route object (and also route objects in navigation guards) as the $route.matched Array. Therefore, we will need to iterate over $route.matched to check for meta fields in route records.
trans-unit.target: 与路线匹配的所有路线记录都以 $route.matched 数组形式显示在 $route 对象（以及导航防护中的路线对象）上。因此，我们将需要遍历 $route.matched 以检查路由记录中的元字段。

trans-unit.source: All three methods return a function that removes the registered guard/hook.
trans-unit.target: 这三个方法都会返回一个删除已注册的守护/挂钩的函数。

trans-unit.source: Also, all examples will be using the full version of Vue to make on-the-fly template compilation possible. See more details here.
trans-unit.target: 另外，所有示例都将使用完整版的Vue，以实现即时模板编译。在这里查看更多详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, if you are using a Node.js server, you can implement the fallback by using the router on the server side to match the incoming URL and respond with 404 if no route is matched. Check out the Vue server side rendering documentation for more information.
trans-unit.target: 或者，如果您使用的是Node.js服务器，则可以通过使用服务器端的路由器来匹配输入URL来实现后备，如果没有路由匹配，则以404进行响应。查看Vue服务器端渲染文档以获取更多信息。

trans-unit.source: An Array containing route records for all nested path segments of the current route. Route records are the copies of the objects in the routes configuration Array (and in children Arrays):
trans-unit.target: 包含当前记录的所有嵌套路径段的记录的数组。路由记录是 routes 配置数组（以及 children 数组）中对象的副本：

trans-unit.source: An alias gives you the freedom to map a UI structure to an arbitrary URL, instead of being constrained by the configuration's nesting structure.
trans-unit.target: 通过别名,您可以自由地将一个UI结构映射到一个任意的URL,而不是受配置的嵌套结构的限制。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when trying to resolve an async component that is required to render a route.
trans-unit.target: 试图解析渲染路由所需的异步组件时发生错误。

trans-unit.source: An example use case is checking for a meta field in the global navigation guard:
trans-unit.target: 一个用例是检查全局导航卫士中的元字段。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains key/value pairs of dynamic segments and star segments. If there are no params the value will be an empty object.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含动态段和星段的键/值对的对象。如果没有参数,数值将是一个空对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains key/value pairs of the query string. For example, for a path /foo?user=1, we get $route.query.user == 1. If there is no query the value will be an empty object.
trans-unit.target: 包含查询字符串的键/值对的对象。例如，对于路径 /foo?user=1 ，我们得到 $route.query.user == 1 。如果没有查询，则该值将为空对象。

trans-unit.source: Any non-name props will be passed along to the rendered component, however most of the time the per-route data is contained in the route's params.
trans-unit.target: 任何非名称的道具都会被传递到渲染组件中,然而大多数时候,每条路线的数据都包含在路线的params中。

trans-unit.target: Apache

trans-unit.source: As the name suggests, the navigation guards provided by vue-router are primarily used to guard navigations either by redirecting it or canceling it. There are a number of ways to hook into the route navigation process: globally, per-route, or in-component.
trans-unit.target: 顾名思义， vue-router 提供的导航保护主要用于通过重定向或取消导航来保护导航。有很多方法可以挂接到路线导航过程中：全局，每个路线或组件内。

trans-unit.source: As the return value of calling router.match(location)
trans-unit.target: 作为调用 router.match(location) 的返回值

trans-unit.source: As you can see the children option is just another Array of route configuration objects like routes itself. Therefore, you can keep nesting views as much as you need.
trans-unit.target: 如您所见， children 选项只是另一个路由配置对象数组，例如 routes 本身。因此，您可以根据需要保留尽可能多的嵌套视图。

trans-unit.source: Aside from using <router-link> to create anchor tags for declarative navigation, we can do this programmatically using the router's instance methods.
trans-unit.target: 除了使用 <router-link> 创建用于声明式导航的锚标记之外，我们还可以使用路由器的实例方法以编程方式进行此操作。

trans-unit.source: In 2.2.0+, optionally provide onComplete and onAbort callbacks to router.push or router.replace as the 2nd and 3rd arguments. These callbacks will be called when the navigation either successfully completed (after all async hooks are resolved), or aborted (navigated to the same route, or to a different route before current navigation has finished), respectively. In 3.1.0+, you can omit the 2nd and 3rd parameter and router.push/router.replace will return a promise instead if Promises are supported.
trans-unit.target: 在2.2.0+中，可以选择提供对 router.push 或 router.replace 的 onComplete 和 onAbort 回调作为第二和第三参数。分别成功完成导航（解决所有异步挂钩之后）或中止导航（导航到同一路线，或导航到当前导航之前的其他路线）时，将分别调用这些回调。在3.1.0+中，您可以省略第二个和第三个参数，如果支持Promises，则 router.push / router.replace 将返回一个promise。

trans-unit.source: One thing to note when using routes with params is that when the user navigates from /user/foo to /user/bar, the same component instance will be reused. Since both routes render the same component, this is more efficient than destroying the old instance and then creating a new one. However, this also means that the lifecycle hooks of the component will not be called.
trans-unit.target: 使用带参数的路由时要注意的一件事是，当用户从 /user/foo 导航到 /user/bar 时，相同的组件实例将被重用。由于两个路由都呈现相同的组件，因此这比销毁旧实例然后创建新实例更有效。但是，这也意味着将不会调用组件的生命周期挂钩。

trans-unit.source: Setting append prop always appends the relative path to the current path. For example, assuming we are navigating from /a to a relative link b, without append we will end up at /b, but with append we will end up at /a/b.
trans-unit.target: 设置 append 属性总是将相对路径附加到当前路径。例如，假设我们从 /a 导航到相对链接 b ，不带 append 我们将以 /b 结尾，但是带 append 我们将以 /a/b 结尾。

trans-unit.source: Setting replace prop will call router.replace() instead of router.push() when clicked, so the navigation will not leave a history record.
trans-unit.target: 设置 replace prop将在单击时调用 router.replace() 而不是 router.push() ，因此导航不会留下历史记录。

trans-unit.source: Setting this to false essentially makes every router-link navigation a full page refresh in IE9. This is useful when the app is server-rendered and needs to work in IE9, because a hash mode URL does not work with SSR.
trans-unit.target: 将其设置为 false 实质上会使每个 router-link 导航在IE9中刷新整个页面。当应用程序是服务器渲染的并且需要在IE9中运行时，此功能很有用，因为哈希模式URL不适用于SSR。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes you need to display multiple views at the same time instead of nesting them, e.g. creating a layout with a sidebar view and a main view. This is where named views come in handy. Instead of having one single outlet in your view, you can have multiple and give each of them a name. A router-view without a name will be given default as its name.
trans-unit.target: 有时，您需要同时显示多个视图而不是嵌套视图，例如，使用 sidebar 视图和 main 视图创建布局。这是命名视图派上用场的地方。您可以在多个视图中为每个视图命名，而不必在视图中只有一个视图。一个 router-view 没有名字将被赋予 default 为它的名字。

trans-unit.source: Vue Router is the official router for Vue.js. It deeply integrates with Vue.js core to make building Single Page Applications with Vue.js a breeze. Features include:

trans-unit.source: We can also use route meta fields to implement fine-grained scroll behavior control. Check out a full example here.

trans-unit.source: We will be using ES2015 in the code samples in the guide.

trans-unit.source: When props is an object, this will be set as the component props as-is. Useful for when the props are static.
trans-unit.target: 当 props 是一个对象时，它将按原样设置为props组件。当道具是静态的时很有用。

trans-unit.source: When props is set to true, the route.params will be set as the component props.
trans-unit.target: 当 props 设置为 true 时， route.params 将设置为组件props。

trans-unit.source: When a <router-view> has a name, it will render the component with the corresponding name in the matched route record's components option. See Named Views for an example.
trans-unit.target: 当 <router-view> 具有名称时，它将在匹配的路由记录的 components 选项中呈现具有相应名称的组件。有关示例，请参见命名视图。

trans-unit.source: When building apps with a bundler, the JavaScript bundle can become quite large, and thus affect the page load time. It would be more efficient if we can split each route's components into a separate chunk, and only load them when the route is visited.
trans-unit.target: 当使用捆绑程序构建应用程序时,JavaScript捆绑程序可能会变得相当大,从而影响页面加载时间。如果我们能够将每个路由的组件拆分成一个独立的块,只有在访问该路由时才加载它们,那么效率会更高。

trans-unit.source: When used with a module system, you must explicitly install the router via Vue.use():
trans-unit.target: 与模块系统一起使用时，必须通过 Vue.use() 显式安装路由器：

trans-unit.source: When using asterisk routes, make sure to correctly order your routes so that asterisk ones are at the end. The route { path: '*' } is usually used to 404 client side. If you are using History mode, make sure to correctly configure your server as well.
trans-unit.target: 使用星号路由时，请确保正确排列您的路由，以使星号结尾。路由 { path: '*' } 通常用于404客户端。如果使用历史记录模式，请确保也正确配置服务器。

trans-unit.source: When using an asterisk, a param named pathMatch is automatically added to $route.params. It contains the rest of the url matched by the asterisk:
trans-unit.target: 使用星号时，名为 pathMatch 的参数会自动添加到 $route.params 。它包含与星号匹配的其余网址：

trans-unit.source: When using client-side routing, we may want to scroll to top when navigating to a new route, or preserve the scrolling position of history entries just like real page reload does. vue-router allows you to achieve these and even better, allows you to completely customize the scroll behavior on route navigation.
trans-unit.target: 使用客户端路由时，我们可能希望在导航到新路由时滚动到顶部，或者保留历史条目的滚动位置，就像真实页面重新加载一样。 vue-router 使您可以实现这些甚至更好的目标，使您可以完全自定义路线导航上的滚动行为。

trans-unit.source: When using history mode, the URL will look "normal," e.g. http://oursite.com/user/id. Beautiful!
trans-unit.target: 使用历史记录模式时，URL看起来“正常”，例如 http://oursite.com/user/id 。美丽！

trans-unit.source: When using this approach, we navigate and render the incoming component immediately, and fetch data in the component's created hook. It gives us the opportunity to display a loading state while the data is being fetched over the network, and we can also handle loading differently for each view.
trans-unit.target: 使用这种方法时，我们将立即导航并渲染传入的组件，并在组件的已 created 钩子中获取数据。它使我们有机会在通过网络获取数据时显示加载状态，并且我们还可以针对每个视图以不同方式处理加载。

trans-unit.source: When you are using the base option in HTML5 history mode, you don't need to include it in to prop's URLs.
trans-unit.target: 当您使用的 base 在HTML5历史模式选项，你不需要把它列入 to 道具的网址。

trans-unit.source: With vue-router, it is very simple to express this relationship using nested route configurations.
trans-unit.target: 使用 vue-router ，使用嵌套的路由配置表达这种关系非常简单。

trans-unit.source: With this approach we fetch the data before actually navigating to the new route. We can perform the data fetching in the beforeRouteEnter guard in the incoming component, and only call next when the fetch is complete:
trans-unit.target: 使用这种方法，我们可以在实际导航到新路线之前获取数据。我们可以在传入组件的 beforeRouteEnter 保护中执行数据获取，并且只有在获取完成后才调用 next ：

trans-unit.source: You can also check out this example live.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以现场查看此示例。

trans-unit.source: You can also register global after hooks, however unlike guards, these hooks do not get a next function and cannot affect the navigation:
trans-unit.target: 您还可以在钩子之后全局注册，但是与警卫不同，这些钩子不会获得 next 功能，并且不会影响导航：

trans-unit.source: You can also return a Promise that resolves to the desired position descriptor:
trans-unit.target: 您也可以返回一个解析到所需位置描述符的 Promise。

trans-unit.source: You can check out a live example here.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在此处查看一个实时示例。

trans-unit.source: You can create a function that returns props. This allows you to cast parameters into other types, combine static values with route-based values, etc.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建一个返回道具的函数。这允许你将参数投向其他类型,将静态值与基于路由的值相结合等等。

trans-unit.source: You can define beforeEnter guards directly on a route's configuration object:
trans-unit.target: 您可以直接在路由的配置对象上定义 beforeEnter 保护：

trans-unit.source: You can have multiple dynamic segments in the same route, and they will map to corresponding fields on $route.params. Examples:
trans-unit.target: 您可以在同一条路线中包含多个动态分段，它们将映射到 $route.params 上的相应字段。例子：

trans-unit.source: You can include a meta field when defining a route:
trans-unit.target: 您可以在定义路线时包括一个 meta 字段：

trans-unit.source: You can register a global guard with router.beforeResolve. This is similar to router.beforeEach, with the difference that resolve guards will be called right before the navigation is confirmed, after all in-component guards and async route components are resolved.
trans-unit.target: 您可以向 router.beforeResolve 注册全局防护。这类似于 router.beforeEach ，不同之处在于，在所有组件内防护和异步路由组件都已解析之后，将在确认导航之前立即调用解析防护。

trans-unit.source: You can register global before guards using router.beforeEach:
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 router.beforeEach 在全局保护之前注册全局：

trans-unit.source: You don't need to do this when using global script tags.
trans-unit.target: 当使用全局脚本标签时,你不需要这样做。

trans-unit.source: You may have noticed that router.push, router.replace and router.go are counterparts of window.history.pushState, window.history.replaceState and window.history.go, and they do imitate the window.history APIs.
trans-unit.target: 您可能已经注意到 router.push ， router.replace 和 router.go 是 window.history.pushState ， window.history.replaceState 和 window.history.go 的对应物，它们确实模仿了 window.history API。

trans-unit.source: You will have to clone directly from GitHub and build vue-router yourself if you want to use the latest dev build.
trans-unit.target: 如果要使用最新的开发版本，则必须直接从GitHub克隆并自己构建 vue-router 。
